system.description:
Effect: Set-Up: The user gains +1 ATK and SPDEF stage for 5 activations, and ends their activation. If the weather is Sunny, the user does Sets-Up and resolves Solar Blade on the same activation. 
Resolution: On their next activation, they attack with and resolve Solar Blade. If the weather is notSunny or Clear, Solar Blade’s Power is reduced by 50%.
